LanguageData.CE_Loophole.label: Embroidery
LanguageData.CE_Loophole.description: Embroidery is a narrow opening in a breastwork or defensive walls, or a recess in a trench. It is used to fire from cover in a given direction.
LanguageData.CE_Loophole_Blueprint.label: Embroidery (blueprint)
LanguageData.CE_Loophole_Frame.label: Embroidery (building)
LanguageData.CE_Loophole_Frame.description: Embroidery is a narrow opening in a breastwork or defensive walls, or a recess in a trench. It is used to fire from cover in a given direction.
